齴齴齴

齴字的基本解释

齴
yǎn
〔齴齴〕（牙齿）外露的样子，如“齿崖崖以齴齴。”

齴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎn］
［《廣韻》魚蹇切，上獮，疑。］
牙齿外露。
[②]［yǎn］
［《集韻》語限切，上産，疑。］
高峻貌。

齴字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【齒字部】　齴； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1535第11
【廣韻】魚蹇切【集韻】語蹇切，?音巚。【玉篇】露齒貌。【王延壽·王孫賦】齒??以齴齴。　又【集韻】笑也。　又【集韻】語限切，音眼。棧齴，高峻貌。【張衡·西京賦】棧齴巉嶮。【註】殿階高峻貌。

齴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
齴字的起名意思

暂无。

齴
Basic explanation of words
齴
yǎn
〔齴齴〕(the teeth) are exposed, such as "tooth cliffs are just like 齴齴."
齴
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǎn］
["Guangyun" fish scorpion cut, upright, suspicious. ]
Exposed teeth.
[②]［yǎn］
["Jiyun" is limited in language, productive, suspicious. ]
Majestic appearance.
齴
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Tooth character department] 　齴; Kangxi strokes: 24; page number: page 1535-11
[Guangyun] Fish and fish cut [Jiyun] The language is cut, and the sound is loud. [Jade articles] Toothy appearance. [Wang Yanshou·Wang Sun Fu] Tooth??　[Jiyun] Laugh again.　[Jiyun] The language is limited and the eye is sound. The stacks are tall and majestic. 【Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu】Zhan Zhen 巉崄. [Note] The towering appearance of the temple.
齴
